mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, type, uuid, only_uuid, application, page, creator, is_public, is_default, domain, lang, metadata, created, updated FROM oskari_appsetup ORDER BY created ASC OFFSET ${offset} limit ${limit}
SELECT id, name, description, type, uuid, only_uuid, application, page, creator, is_public, is_default, domain, lang, metadata, created, updated FROM oskari_appsetup WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, name, description, type, uuid, only_uuid, application, page, creator, is_public, is_default, domain, lang, metadata, created, updated FROM oskari_appsetup WHERE uuid::text = #{uuId}
SELECT id, name, description, type, uuid, only_uuid, application, page, creator, is_public, is_default, domain, lang, metadata, created, updated FROM oskari_appsetup WHERE name = #{name}

SELECT id, name, description, type, uuid, only_uuid, application, page, creator, is_public, is_default, domain, lang, metadata, created, updated FROM oskari_appsetup WHERE creator = #{user_id} ORDER BY name ASC

SELECT s.appsetup_id, s.bundle_id, s.seqno, s.state, s.config, s.bundleinstance, b.name FROM oskari_appsetup_bundles s, oskari_bundle b WHERE appsetup_id = #{view_id} AND s.bundle_id = b.id ORDER BY s.seqno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE oskari_appsetup SET used=now(), usagecount=(SELECT usagecount+1 FROM oskari_appsetup WHERE id=#{id}) WHERE id=#{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oskari_appsetup_bundles (appsetup_id, bundle_id, seqno, state, config, bundleinstance) VALUES ( #{viewId}, #{bundleId}, #{seqNo}, #{state}, #{config}, #{bundleinstance})
